page.title: 06WYTON GARAGE, BILTON
page.content: Wyton Garage is situated at the junction between 2 roads, the main Hull to Withernsea road and the much smaller road linking Bilton with Sproatley. It is the only petrol filling station in our area block. Before Wyton Garage became a garage it was a grocery shop. The owner, Mrs. Hartley, employs 2 men full-time to work in the garage and also uses 5 men on a part-time basis. The garage tests cars for their M.O.T. test as well as serving petrol. It is open from 8.00a.m.to 6.00p.m. Monday to Friday,8.00a.m.to 4.00p.m. on Saturday and is open from10.00a.m. to 2.00p.m. on a Sunday.
